document.full_text: rocker vince neil has been charged with battery and disorderly conduct for allegedly jabbing his ex-girlfriend at a las vegas theater, prosecutors said on tuesday.
document.title: rocker vince neil charged in fight with ex-girlfriend
lines_and_colors: rocker vince neil has been charged with battery and disorderly conduct for allegedly jabbing his ex-girlfriend at a las vegas theater, prosecutors said on tuesday.
